item.title: Testing
item.description: Testing plgd hub pull requests When a developer creates a pull request at plgd hub, it automatically triggers tests. The tests pulls the latest IoTivity-lite release, which is represented by docker image ghcr.io/iotivity/iotivity-lite/cloud-server-debug:latest. It contains all functionality to run with the hub and it is updated when new IoTivity-lite release is published. function encode64(data) { r = ""; for (i=0; i 2; c2 = ((b1 & 0x3) 4); c3 = ((b2 & 0xF) 6); c4 = b3 & 0x3F; r = "
